TopicTitle: Hello Random Strangers of the Internet

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone

Been playing KSP since .16 never really posted much on the fourms with my old account which unfortunately got eated by the Kraken in the fourm purge last month. But nothing was really lost. I'm an Aussie and mostly play KSP when i'm putting off assigments for uni and various other reasons. One of my favorite sports in KSP is not to try and get to places already done that, although i absolutely fail at docking I will get there soon. At this time my favorite sport within KSP is Kerbal Punting. I will elaborate on that soon in the challenge thread.

Cheers to you all and its good to be back!
